content: प्रस्था {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To set out, depart; पारसीकांस्ततो जेतुं प्रतस्थे स्थलवर्त्मना <ls>R. 4. 60</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 22.</ls> {@--2@} To advance, march towards. {@--3@} To walk, move; <ls>R. 1. 89.</ls> {@--4@} To stand firmly. {@--5@} To be established. {@--6@} To approach, come near. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to retire. {@--2@} To send away, dismiss, despatch; तौ दंपती स्वां प्रति राजधानीं प्रस्थापयामास वशी वशिष्ठः <ls>R. 2. 70.</ls> {@--3@} To drive away, banish, expel; <ls>Ku. 6. 7.</ls> {@--4@} To urge forwards, push on.
